data.title: Ribbon Around A Bomb

data.text:
Film Bombast: MOCATV’s The Art of Punk

“My name is Raymond Pettibon and I designed this motherfuckin’ thing.” –Raymond Pettibon MOCATV is a contemporary art video channel hosted on Youtube, operated by (obviously) the Museum of Contemporary … Continue reading →

Film Bombast: Weatherman ’69

Arts Bombast: David Markey

David Markey is basically a punk-rock Renaissance Man. He is a member of one of my all-time-favorite bands Sin 34, director of the ridiculously excellent Desperate Teenage Lovedolls, and documentary … Continue reading →

September 4, 2012 · 2 Comments

In the Mood For… Eyes

San Francisco: Off!
